message: I propose a 90/10 split.  Let's start fair and see how it goes.
You wanted to start fair, but I'll try to get a better deal now. Your turn to negotiate!
Let's compromise.  I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need a bigger piece of the pie than your last offer.
You're giving up more, but I still think I can do better. You're not getting away that easily!
